original_title: 7 including accomplice of ‘Midigama Ruwan’ arrested with 5.6kg Hash
original_body_lines: Sri Lanka Police said that seven suspects, including an accomplice of organized criminal ‘Midigama Ruwan’, have been arrested with 5.6 kilograms of Hashish.
The suspects have been arrested following raids conducted in the Habaraduwa and Baddegama areas, police said.
The estimated street value of the seized narcotics is around Rs. 40 million.
